text: André Cartier (24 December 1945 – 22 May 2020) was a Canadian actor. He was known for playing André in the children's series Passe-Partout. Cartier was born in Montreal, Quebec. He also starred in Sol et Gobelet, Bound for Glory, Les Oraliens and La bonne aventure. Cartier died on 22 May 2020 in Dunham, Quebec of cancer at the age of 74. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Canada Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Canadian stage actors Category:Actors from Quebec Category:Writers from Quebec
title: André Cartier
